transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Good afternoon sir, Ashutosh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Ji sir ji aap mere number pe call kar lete sir number bheja toh tha maine aapko wo escalate hoke case aaya abhi mere paas.
Executive: Kaunsa number aapka?
Customer: 73097 wala aapko aapne bola tha na whatsapp pe usi din whatsapp pe diya tha Tuesday baat hui thi aapse.
Executive: Haan toh abhi jo photo bhi nahi lagaya mere ko call ek bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Call ek bhi nahi aa raha hai sir is hafte 16 call aaya aapke paas?
Customer: Aaj ka date mein dekhiye.
Executive: Aaj ka date ka ho sakta hai na aaya ho ek second mein wo bhi dekh le raha hu main. Aaj ke date ka ho sakta hai.


Executive: Aaj bhi call aaya hai sir ek.
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Call miss kiya hai miss kar diya aapne 11:13 pe aaya tha Punjab se.
Customer: 11:13 se?
Executive: Haan 11:13 pe aap lead manager mein dekhenge apne IndiaMART pe toh aapko dikhayega miss ho gaya aapka call ye.
Customer: Ek hi call aaya tha.
Executive: Haan matlab is hafte 16 call aapke kal ek call kal aaya hai aapke paas mein. Kal ek aur aaya hai do.
Customer: Arey is ye package mein itne call aayega iske pehle jo mera jo tha MDC mein kitna call aa raha tha?
Executive: Wo usse badhega ya kam rahe?
Executive: Call mein dekh le raha hu aapka. MDC mein.


MDC aapka kab se chal raha hai? MDC aapka 3 October 2025 se. Aur ye start kab se kar raha hai?
Executive: 10 November se.



Executive: MDC sir kitne 20 din chala hai aapka MDC mein bata deta hu aapko call jo aaya hai na dekho October mein aapke jo aaya hai 11 call aaya hai aapke paas.
Customer: Nahi nahi kam se kam toh call toh wo kitna aa raha aane wala tha abhi bola toh uss time sir ne. Jo aapka MDC mein roz ka kam se kam 20-25 call aayega.
Executive: Aisa kuch nahi number bola tha kya kisne bola aapko ki number itna number call aayega?
Customer: Humse kam matlab aisa hi diya nahi hai abhi toh 10 bhi call nahi aa rahe.
Executive: Nahi nahi ye ye aapse kisne bola ki matlab itne hi calls aayenge per day ki?
Customer: Sir ye bolke chitti.
Executive: Matlab sir kisi ne bola ho aapko likh ke diya ho?
Customer: Kya hai sir?
Executive: Haan? Call kyun kam aa rahe hai kya problem hai isme?
Executive: Sir nahi main problem wahi actually jaanna chah raha hu ki matlab aisa actually koi fixed number nahi hota call ka. Ab maan lo buyer ne aaya aapke catalog pe dekha aur waha pe usko laga call kar lena chahiye toh call kar liya matlab call ki koi limit nahi hoti ki itna call aayega itna nahi aayega. Ye package aapka visibility ke liye hai visibility aa rahi hai aur even is matlab November mein total 30 call aayi hai aapke paas mein October mein 11 call thi. Toh call flow aapka badha hai lekin main pehle ye jaanna chah raha hu ki aisa bola kisne ki din ka 20 call aayega?
Customer: Wo dusra sales se baat kiya tha jo pehle jo.
Executive: Unhone kahin pe likh ke diya tha aapko ki 20 call aayega whatsapp pe email pe kahin pe bhi?
Customer: Aisa kuch likh ke nahi diya.
Executive: Kyunki matlab aisa nahi hai madam honestly bata raha hu agar aapke paas kahin pe bhi likh ke diya hai unhone toh aap dijiye main wo team ko forward karta hu escalate karta hu is cheez ke liye ye galat hai. Call aapka kya hai na ki dekho aapka jaha jaha pe page dikh raha hai thik hai. Ye package ka main ye hai ki promotion aapka hota hai cities mein abhi jaha jaha pe aapka page dikh raha hai na un un city pe maan lo waha se koi buyer aaya jaise maan lo bangalore dikh raha hai ab bangalore se koi aaya aur aapko dekha toh wo call kar diya aapko agar uska mann hua toh matlab hum kisi nahi kar sakte call karna hi hai wo toh buyer ki marzi hai na toh hum log promotion kar sakte hai call badhne ke liye promotion jaruri hota hai aur promotion aapka maintain ho raha hai yaha pe abhi jaise is mahine matlab November mein till date aapke paas mein 30 call aayi hai 16 tarikh tak aaj ek call aa gayi hai toh wo 31 ho gayi. 31 mein se aapke paas jo hai aapne nau call miss ki hai 22 call aapne answer kari hai toh ye call ka matlab flow badh jayega na flow badhane ke liye hum log already kaam kar rahe hai aapke catalog pe sari cheezon pe toh wo hum kaam kar denge lekin main abhi bhi clear karunga ki aisa koi limit nahi hota hai ki itna hi itna call aayega wo koi issue nahi hai aisa bhi ho sakta hai ki pure mahine mein ek hi do call aaye aisa bhi ho sakta hai 100 200 call aaye koi isko limitation nahi hai sir. Hum buyer ko rokte nahi hum buyer ko bolte nahi call hi karni hai.
Customer: Accha thik hai sir abhi kya hai aap mera profile pura set log achcha karke dijiye sir.
Executive: Nahi wo main kar raha hu wo already matlab kaam kar rahe hai uss cheez pe ek cheez aap mujhe bata dijiye usi catalog se related isme ek product hai aapka mujhe batana category D ranking kaha gayi ye?


Executive: Kitne mahine ka aapko utne jyada hi aapke paas jayega D ranking D ranking.
Executive: Haan. Industrial manpower services isme kaam kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan manpower haan manpower supply kar rahe hai.
Executive: Industrial manpower services mein na toh thik hai ye main keyword add kar de raha hu uske alawa jo hamare main main keyword toh already lage hue hai labour contractor tile flooring services manpower solution contract labour supply supply services inme aur unskilled labour services ho gaya hotel staff recruitment services ho gaya. Hotel staff recruitment services ye out of stock hai aapka toh matlab isme kar rahe hai aap ya nahi kar rahe abhi?
Customer: Staff nahi hai sir jaise hotel mein kisi ko chef chahiye hota hai chinese south india north india tandoori aur tumhara management aur captain housekeeping.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh aisa rakh sakte hai kya ye hotel staff recruitment services jo hai isme hum log karwa sakte hai?
Customer: Hotel mein koi agar staff chahiye usko supply kar sakte hai.
Executive: Haan haan wahi toh matlab recruitment ek wahi tarika ho gaya na main chalo isse related keyword bana ke main dal dunga jo bhi near by keyword hoga. Hospitality recruitment services iska bhi wahi scenario hoga na?
Customer: Hospital nahi karta hospital mein ek do din ka kaam nahi hota.
Executive: Samajh gaya aur housekeeping staff?
Customer: Haan haan usme housekeeping ka unskilled semi skilled ye sab.
Executive: Thik hai aur ye batana civil construction karke keyword hamara pada hua tha civil construction dal sakte hai?
Customer: Haan haan civil.
Executive: Thik hai ultratech ultratech cement bhi pada tha ye cement wagera mein toh nahi karte ho na product mein toh kaam hai nahi aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi usko out kara dijiye abhi.
Executive: Thik hai samajh gaya aur koi keyword hai kya service floor tiles stone cutter ye product wale hai ye hata deta hu main product wale sare hata deta hu. Swimming pool maintenance services isme karte hai hum log?
Customer: Swimming pool maintenance services bole toh usko maintenance wo dusra ho gaya.
Executive: Accha isme nahi karte. Hai jaise labour ka kaam karane ka hai tiles fitting granite marble.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Thik hai toh main ek kaam karta hu isko main correct kar deta hu ye jo hai na ye sari cheeze main correct kar deta hu call aapka behtar ho jayega aur aapka mera number aapke paas hoga main dobara message kar deta hu abhi aapko whatsapp pe please wo number save kar lijiye kyunki wo escalate hoke aata hai mere paas lagta hai time aane mein tab tak aap mujhe directly call kar liya kijiye aur abhi jaise aapne customer care pe call kiya na dekhiye ticket open ho gaya toh isko close karwa sakta hu na abhi?
Customer: Haan haan abhi kara dijiye aur sir haan aap kar dunga photo photo achcha karke design kara dijiye please sir.
Executive: Wo main karwa deta hu wo matlab aap nishchint raho uske liye ye cheeze matlab hamare hath mein hai wo main karwa deta hu ek suggestion aapko aur hai ki jo aapke paas calls aa rahi hai na inko try kijiye ki jyada calls answer kare maine aapko baat bhi ki aapse ki number ek do aur add kara denge hum log calls ke liye. Toh koi hai aisa jiska number add kara sakte hai hum log?
Customer: Thik hai main abhi wo number karke add karta hu owner se baat karke.
Executive: Haan number ek do aur add kara dijiye main abhi aapko whatsapp pe message dala hu number save kar lijiyega mera please.
Customer: Okay sir okay okay thank you sir.
Executive: Haan thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough calls.

- Wants profile to be set up well.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified call volume is not fixed.

- Agreed to correct catalog and related keywords.

- Suggested adding more numbers for calls.

- Agreed to close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add more numbers for calls.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, manpower, keywords, profile
